404.description: You hear music in the distance, but nothing can be seen here.

description: Listen Together with Friends around the Globe in rooms. All you need is a YouTube, Spotify, or Apple Music account.

listen.title: Listen Anywhere
listen.description: Stereo integrates with the music applications you know and love. All you need is a YouTube, Spotify, or Apple Music account.
listen.p: Your friend listens to a different music application? No worry, Stereo will find and play that same song on your application instead.

playlist.title: Quick Start
playlist.p1: It takes less than 30 seconds to start listening together. Just copy-paste the playlist link and start right away.
playlist.p2: Have a good playlist to share with friends, or did your favorite artist just release their new album? Just grab the link and go!

rules.title: Your Room. Your Rule.
rules.p1: Listen either in public or private rooms. Set a password to avoid unwelcome guests. Only collaborators can add songs, but everyone can chat and add their reactions.
rules.p2: Invite your close friends to be moderators. Ban offended messages and people. Customize room rules so that your friends know what songs can be added.

contact.title: Contact
contact.p: Be sure to reach out at any time should you have any ideas, questions, or encounter any bugs.

delete.label: Deactivate account
delete.description: You can delete your account at any time.

modal.title: Sad to See You Go...
modal.description: Deactivating your account will remove all of your information, rooms.

delete.deleted: Your account and data has been removed. Feel free to come back at any time!

profile.title: About Myself
profile.authPrompt: Join Stereo to customize your profile.

username.label: Username
username.helpText: 15 characters max, lowercase, no space or special characters

playlist.helpText: Optional: Enter a playlist link to listen together

addNew.title: Create New Room
addNew.warnNoPass: The room password is not set. Anyone with the link can enter the room and become a collaborator. Continue anyway?

addExisted.title: Use an Existing Room
addExisted.description: Select a room to start listening
addExisted.helpText: Find something by entering a playlist link above to add to an existing room or create an empty room

playlist.title: Start Listening Together
playlist.description: Have an awesome playlist to listen together with friends? Just enter its link below.

room.label: Room
room.description: Join {{title}} on Stereo and listen to music together.

init.password1: Enter room password to join. Leave empty if it has no password.
init.password2: You can also join by asking the host to add you as a collaborator

info.title: Title
info.titleHelp: Enter a title for the room

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.publicAllowGuestsHelp: If disabled, only room members can add songs
privacy.passwordHelp: Anyone with a password will also become a collaborator
privacy.newPasswordHelp: Current members are not required to enter new password

member.title: Add a Member
member.helpText: Enter the username of the one you want to add

delete.title: Delete {{title}}
delete.description: This will remove this room along with its data
delete.enterName: Enter the room name to continue

chat.title: Chat
chat.authPromptHook: Listen to music with friends and chat no matter where they are

player.pausedHelpText: Use the button below to unpause
